text: Amber Rose becomes a victim of home invasion. According to multiple outlets, the television personality got quite a scare Tuesday morning, May 16, when she discovered that a man had broken into her Los Angeles - area pad while she was catching her beauty sleep. TMZ reports that the suspect was in her home for a whopping four hours before he was discovered. Not only that, but many including her son, mother, assistant and bodyguards were all also home at the time — and at possible risk, during the time of the incident. Law enforcement sources revealed that the man gained access to Rose ’ s residence by breaking one of her kitchen windows and entering through her pantry.
